wikipedia_page.main: Roy Thomas Edmond Bergiers (born 11 November 1950) is a former Welsh international rugby union player.Bergiers was born in Carmarthen. In 1974 he toured South Africa with the British Lions and at the time played club rugby for Llanelli.
